name: Avalanche Mountain 2 - Hit The Slopes on The Top Free Extreme Snowboarding Racing Game
name_original: Avalanche Mountain 2 - Hit The Slopes on The Top Free Extreme Snowboarding Racing Game
description:
Get ready to hit the slopes covering 4 different mountains in one of the most exciting snowboarding games in the App Store!

First stop are the bunny hills in Avalanche Mountain where you will need to take some time to hone in on your skills. Next up try performing those tricks you just mastered on the bunny hills of Avalanche Mountain, by performing them under the star lit sky of Blister Bluffs. From here on out you take your chances as you attempt to conquer Whispering Peaks and Yeti Canyon.

Race against time as you perform flips, cannonballs, chicken salad, the suitcase or the elusive cross rocket. Increase your score with any of the above moves, but be sure to leave enough time to make it to the lodge, or you will be left out in the cold somewhere on top of the mountain.

Compete against your friends in our multiplayer action where you can actually see the progress of your friends on your screen!
